items.name: architecture
items.title: NanoBricks Architecture
items.description: This guide explains how the NanoBricks code is arranged.

items.name: data
items.title: NanoBricks Data Model
items.description: This guide explains how data is stored in NanoBricks.

items.name: style
items.title: NanoBricks Style Guide
items.description: This guide explains how NanoBricks code should be styled.

items.name: tools
items.title: Tool Development
items.description: This guide explains how to develop new user tools for NanoBricks.

items.name: strands
items.title: NanoBricks Strands
items.description: This guide explains how strands are modeled in NanoBricks and compares this model to caDNAno.

items.name: mousekey
items.title: Mouse and Keyboard Handling
items.description: This guide explains how to handle mouse and keyboard input in NanoBricks.

items.name: raycasting
items.title: Raycasting and object picking
items.description: This guide explains how detect objects picked with the mouse.

items.name: plugins
items.title: Plugin Development
items.description: This guide explains how write plugins for NanoBricks.

items.name: files
items.title: NanoBricks Files
items.description: This guide explains how NanoBricks saves and loads file, and describes the .nbk file format.

items.name: rendering
items.title: Efficient rendering
items.description: This guide explains how NanoBricks renders hundreds of thousands of voxels and strands using JavaScript and WebGL.
